CustomField.description: We have some systems (like Marathon) that don't use the Client's gateway, so we need to check an override first. And since usually the payment gateway is the same for all of a client's entities (and it's easy to forget to set the gateway on a new entity), we look to the Client Account for the entity.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Name on the Entity's Payment Gateway Override, otherwise the Client Account's Payment Gateway
CustomField.label: Payment Gateway Name
